vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2088 for a vehicle display, sales, and service use on property zoned Subdistrict 2 within Planned Development District No. 535, the C.F. Hawn Special Purpose District No. 3, on the southeast corner of C.F. Hawn Freeway and Cade Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a site plan and  conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a site plan and  conditions
Z234-313(JG)
